Cast: Edna May Oliver, Elizabeth Allan, Jessie Ralph, Harry Beresford, Freddie Bartholomew, Hugh Walpole, Basil Rathbone, Herbert Mundin, John Buckler, Fay Chaldecott, Una O'Connor, Lionel Barrymore, Violet Kemble Cooper, Elsa Lanchester, Jean Cadell

See full summary » When David's father dies, his mother remarries. His new stepfather Murdstone has a mean and cruel view on how to raise a child. When David's mother dies from grief, Murdstone sends David to London to work for a living. When David escapes to his aunt Betsey his life starts to get better. Written by Mattias Thuresson
Keywords: stepfather, aunt, abusive stepfather, child abuse, long title
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.

Description: Directed by George Cukor.  With Freddie Bartholomew, Frank Lawton, Edna May Oliver, Elizabeth Allan. When David's father dies, his mother remarries. His new stepfather Murdstone has a mean and cruel view on how to raise a child. When David's mother dies from grief, Murdstone sends David to London to work for a living. When David escapes to his aunt Betsey his life starts to get better.
